message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $135. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $130.  This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
